name: Pub/Sub Lite Public Topic Template
description: A custom Dataflow Flex template that publishes data from the public Pub/Sub topic `projects/pubsub-public-data/topics/taxirides-realtime` (input) to a Pub/Sub Lite topic (output)

parameters.name: pubsubLiteTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Lite topic
parameters.helpText: A Pub/Sub Lite topic to publish to, e.g. projects/123456789/locations/us-central1-b/subscriptions/my-subscription.
